title: 100% Disk Usage
body:
I know there are many other posts about this problem and I tried a lot of them and they don't work. When I play League or any other games my internet is terrible even when I don't even have League opened. This problem started about a week ago and I've been playing league for about 2 months and I've no problems till now. I've used an Ethernet cable to stop using the wireless internet and it worked for a bit but then my screen just kept freezing. I've uninstalled League and then even reinstalled and nothing changed and it was just the same. For my phone TV and even my laptop can run everything fine except for my desktop which has the problem. Please help I haven't played League in a week and I basically have nothing else to do than play Overwatch.
 {{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body:
To clarify, you are having connection issues or disk usage issues? Or both?

Both can be caused by a whole bunch of different things so if you could give any more details about the specifics of your problem it'd be a great help.

My connection issues I have no problem I can easily do anything fast on my internet on any device execpt for my pc. My disk is just I have no idea, I’ve been able to play League for a bit but I’m having the disk issue a tiny bit but then it goes away but I still have lag and it has nothing to do with my connection.

If you're lagging, it's your connection. If you're not lagging on anything else, it just means it's your connection to League specifically.

Follow the tips here and see if any help you out.
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#connection
